title: The best Prime Day laptop deals aren’t on Amazon—here’s where to find them
content:
You can find some significant savings at Amazon for the retailer's Prime Day sale right now, but if you're in the market for a laptop, you're probably better off looking elsewhere. Even though Amazon has some good sales on laptops, some of the machines the retailer has discounted contain older processors or graphics cards. For those needing something more current or anyone wanting to stick to the bigger OEMs like Dell, HP, Lenovo, and Microsoft, we've rounded up some of the best deals on PC notebooks for productivity, travel, and gaming.

Lenovo

The 14-inch and 13-inch models will have FHD displays with touch and non-touch options, as well as FreeSync technology. (credit: Valentina Palladino)

  • Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i Chromebook (14-inch, Intel i3-N305) for $350 (was $550) at Lenovo
  • Lenovo Legion Slim 5i Gen 8 (16-inch, Intel Core i5-13500H and RTX 4050) for $1,100 at 12 pm ET (was $1,350) at Lenovo
